title: Let’s Play a Lot!
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Guh.... It’s so hard.... There’s still a chance.... Aahh~!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Alright.... that’s a win for me. Rina-chan’s board「Yay」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>How frustrating~! You’re really good at games, huh, Rina! Well, Lanzhu guesses that’s a part of your charm. It’s awesome! But Lanzhu can’t go down like this.... Lanzhu is getting the hang of it, so let’s do one more, Rina!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Sure. I’ll take you on as many times as you want. Rina-chan’s board「Fired Up」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Kyaaaah! Yay, Lanzhu did it! It’s my win! Now it’s 1 to 30!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Hmph, you’re getting good, Lanzhu-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Let’s play more until Lanzhu wins more than you~~~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>....I guess we need to play a lot more then.... But if I keep winning,  I can play a lot lot more with you, huh.... Alright, time to get serious.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu won’t lose~~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
